fullText: Andrew Garfield gives a performance of such blazing honesty and emotional intensity that he transforms Tony Kushner's young prophet into a figure of true spiritual majesty.
dtliExcerpt: Andrew Garfield gives a performance of such blazing honesty and emotional intensity that he transforms Tony Kushner's young prophet into a figure of true spiritual majesty.
